text: Central India is an Indian region. Central India consists of two Indian states: Madhya Pradesh and Chhattisgarh. It shares a border with Rajasthan, Gujarat, Odisha, Jharkhand, Uttar Pradesh, Maharashtra and Telangana.One of the states i.e.Chattisgarh is ruled by the BJP with Chief Minister Vishnu Deo Sai. *Raipur: capital city and largest city of Chhattisgarh. *Indore: the largest city of Madhya Pradesh *Bhopal: the capital city of Madhya Pradesh. This map of India (press to open) shows all central Indian states in the color pink. The larger one is Madhya Pradesh while the smaller one is Chhattisgarh. Category:Regions of India
title: Central India
